about_the_game:
God Save Us is an RTS/God game where you control a village and use your powers to defend the villagers against waves of enemies. Your main power is the ability to possess any friendly unit and use them to fight in first-person. There are 4 types of units at the moment that you can control: Warrior, Archer, Mage and Villager.

  • Manage a village
  • Use your god powers in top view
  • Fight and use different classes powers in first person
  • Choose from multiples upgrades
  • Climb the leaderboards
    • Maximum waves leaderboard
    • Speedrun to 30 waves leaderboard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit | Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: INTEL. AMD 4 cores CPU at 3Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 7950 or above, Nvidia GTX 670 or above. 4GB video ram.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit | Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: INTEL. AMD 4 cores CPU at 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 7950 or above, Nvidia GTX 670 or above. 4GB video ram.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: God Save Us is a Real-Time Strategy Game where you can switch from top view to first person view instantly to protect your village from incoming waves of attacks.
